law.catch_line: Minimum requirements for positions created under KRS 16.187.

text.section:
Upon completion of a probationary period of one (1) year:
Commercial vehicle enforcement officers, arson investigator officers, and hazardous devices investigator officers shall have successfully completed the Peace Officer Professional Standards (POPS) certification process through the Kentucky State Police Academy or through the Department of Criminal Justice Training; and
Commercial vehicle enforcement officers shall successfully complete and pass a certified course in General Hazardous Materials and North American Standard Driver/Vehicle Inspection.

law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2009.
